description: Explore how KnownOrigin, a digital art marketplace, integrates blockchain technology with open-source principles to create a sustainable environment for artists and technologists. This piece delves into the intersection of digital art, blockchain innovations, and the open-source paradigm, highlighting KnownOrigin's efforts in promoting decentralization, technological advancement, and environmental consciousness.
keywords: KnownOrigin, digital art marketplace, open-source, blockchain, NFTs, Ethereum, sustainability, decentralization, digital economy, environmental consciousness, Ethereum 2.0, technological innovation
title: KnownOrigin and the Sustainability of Open Source
